ISSUE.TITLE: Performance issue with many groups, too many SQL queries
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY <!-- Briefly describe the problem. --> Same Issue as #3214, only this time please handle groups also AWX is crunching through all groups with 10,000 queries for us. Before the job even starts for real. For 60 seconds.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4482 from ryanpetrello/prometheus_errors fix a bug in the API metrics endpoint Reviewed-by: https://github.com/softwarefactory-project-zuul[bot]

COMMIT.MESSAGE: optimize a slow query in inventory script generation see: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/4461
